faqs.question: How do I become a sponsor?
faqs.answer: Checkout the sponsership packet under 'Become a sponser' on the homepage and/or email us directly!

faqs.question: How do I register?
faqs.answer: There will be a link on this website once registration opens.

faqs.question: When does registration open?
faqs.answer: We will open registration for the Datathon in the fall.

faqs.question: How many people can be on a team?
faqs.answer: You are allowed a maximum of 5 people on a Datathon team.

faqs.question: Are we required to stay at the venue for the duration of the Datathon?
faqs.answer: No, we would like everyone to be present for the opening and closing ceremonies, but you can choose where you would like to work on your project.

faqs.question: How can I find a team to join?
faqs.answer: Come to the opening ceremonies and there will be time before the competition starts to find teammates.

faqs.question: Who can compete in the Datathon?
faqs.answer: This year's Datathon will be open to all Rice students in addition to students at other Houston area colleges and universities.

faqs.question: What is the acceptence process?
faqs.answer: All Rice students are guaranteed a place at the Datathon. Additionally, our goal is to accept almost everyone who wants to come from other nearby colleges.

faqs.question: What kind of prizes will there be?
faqs.answer: The prizes can range from cool tech to gift cards.

faqs.question: Will there be food?
faqs.answer: We will provide dinner on friday and breakfast and lunch on saturday in addition to snacks throughout the event.

faqs.question: Do you reimburse travel expenses?
faqs.answer: We will reimburse travel from within the Houston area up to a certain amount.

faqs.question: How much experience is required to participate in the Datathon?
faqs.answer: None, we have tracks and challenges that range from advanced to introductory, and some will have tutorials and tips to help you get started. In addition there will be mentors that will be there to help.

faqs.question: What should I bring?
faqs.answer: Bring a laptop or anything else you need to work on your project, we'll have everything else.
